channel.title: Data Processing on Dixit Patel
channel.description: Recent content in Data Processing on Dixit Patel

item.title: Data processing pipeline with Spring Batch
item.description: I spent a very exciting summer working on an open-source project through the Google Summer of Code program. Kudo’s to Google for hosting such an amazing program. The project was challenging both technically as well as personally. I had the opportunity to learn a lot about Bioinformatics, from an amazing team of experts at the Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center (MSKCC). MSKCC is a leading cancer treatment center in United States (and the first to get an NCI designation!
